Text.Value: Damn. Find another way inside!
Push against the wreckage.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [SEAN]  All FF'S are pushing against the burning wreckage. The Player kicks the door with some effort but fails to kick down the burning wreckage., , [KRIS] All FF's and the player pushes against the burning wreckage (TBD) but fails., , .
EditorData.SFXTags: Burning wreckage being push against. It's not budging. [NEW] Sound of the Kick at the door.

Text.Value: WE CAN DO IT! PUT YOUR BACKS INTO IT! PUSH!
That's right! THREE, TWO, ONE, PUSH!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Spurred on by the player's inspiring words, the Flaming fists brace, and move back to strike against the door in unison in time.
EditorData.SFXTags: Door breaking/collapsing sound. Should share same effect as cinematic node 89b9e50b-7ed4-e515-e763-45358e991716
EditorData.VFXTags: Dust or splinter spring out from door breaking. Should share same effect as cinematic node 89b9e50b-7ed4-e515-e763-45358e991716

Text.Value: Now push, damn it!
Go! There has to be another way in!
Unless you're here to finish the job, get over here and push!
What happened to this place?
The counsellor. Gods. We need to get moving, now.
Inside, hurry! We don't have much time!

EditorData.NodeContext: Relieved and ready to move move move

Text.Value: Leave.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [SEAN] All FF's are pushing against the burning wreckage.  Player does a running kick to the burning wreckage and breaks it down., , [KRIS] All FF's and the player pushes against the burning wreckage (TBD) and succeeds
EditorData.SFXTags: Burning wreckage being push against. Wreckage faills/collapse - the path is cleared. [NEW] Sound of the Kick at the door.

Text.Value: There was no duke inside, just a wood elf. And she's dead.
Who on earth do you think you are? If you aren't helping, shove off!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The fists all try to push in the door, but fail.

Text.Value: Stop staring, start helping!

EditorData.NodeContext: Less angry and more annoyed, actually.

Text.Value: Who's trapped in there?
Let out a rallying cry as you help the Fists push. ONWARD!
Your kind happened!
Grand Duke Ravengard?
Goblins and drow happened.

EditorData.NodeContext: Impatient; this is really not the time for backstory.

Text.Value: Grand Duke Ravengard could be inside! Don't just stand there - push!

EditorData.NodeContext: Urgent and focused; slightly annoyed with PC.

Text.Value: He could be trapped. Help us get through!
Yes - the hero of Baldur's Gate.

Synopsis: A group of Flaming Fists are trying to force a way into the burning inn at Waukeen's Rest. They can hear someone inside - they believe it might be Grand Duke Ravengard, who they had been sent to protect.
